comments:
Using 0917, take a self-hosting workspace (based on the plugins in 0910) with
everything from binary except JDT/Core. Then import all plugins from the drop
0917 (using import existing binary projects). At the end, you got a dialog
saying that:
org.eclipse.update.ui.win32
org.eclipse.help.ui.win32
org.eclipse.update.ui.win32

didn't update properly.
